hanzi-su-wiki:
誉

Значения

Честь, слава; хвалить, славить

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Вверху — руки и жбан вина. Угощать вином и говорить 言 приятные речи — хвалить.

Варианты

譽
purpleculture_pinyin:
yù
to praise; to acclaim; reputation
хвалить; приветствовать; репутация
rtega_mnemonic:
譽譽RS
誉誉		fame, reputation, praise, honour, glory
  • speak 言 to give 與 praise to someone
  • ⓢ speak 言 about rising 兴 fame
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 譽)
Antonyms: 毁
Ideographic: Word 言 of one's success 兴
purpleculture_examples:
荣誉 [ róng yù ]: honor; credit; glory; (honorable) reputation; honorary
名誉 [ míng yù ]: fame; reputation; honor; honorary; emeritus (of retired professor)
誉为 [ yù wéi ]: to acclaim as
信誉 [ xìn yù ]: prestige; distinction; reputation; trust
声誉 [ shēng yù ]: reputation; fame
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 兴 [ xìng ] to thrive, to prosper, to flourish
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
heisig_chinese_memo: This owl's reputation skyrocketed after he created a tool in order to speak human words.
heisig_constituent: reputation, owl, tool, say, words, keitai, mouth
koohiiStory1: This owl´s reputation skyrocketed after he created a tool in order to speak human words.
koohiiStory2: By word of mouth, owl-luring tool (raise (#1938)) gained a reputation of amazingly effective and reliable device.
jp_example_words: 名誉(めいよ): honor, credit, prestige
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There’s grass on the ground and the fins there say you have no honor. The fins are left over from the fish you dismembered and they do not believe it was an act of honor. Now they are just sitting on the ground on the grass, calling you out for having no honor.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Listen to what the fins have to say as they flop around on the ground in the grass. Hear them swish about as they flop, brushing up against the blades of grass.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Being one of little honor, you decide to squash these vocal fins with your yo-yo (よ). You take out your yo-yo and start bashing each fin with it until they stop talking about what little honor you have.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine taking your yo-yo out to do this. Feel the string tighten around your finger as you unleash the yo-yo and silence all the fins.
Ru_Notes: В разных словах, но много производных от <ruby>名誉<rt>めいよ</rt></ruby> "слава, честь, доброе имя".

Kanshudo_mnemonic: thriving (兴) words (言) bring you glory
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you offer a new invention to society by announcing it with your words, your reputation will shoot up.

誉字的基本解释

誉
（譽）
yù
名声：荣誉。名誉。信誉。沽名钓誉。
称扬，赞美：毁誉。交口称誉。
古同“豫”，欢乐。
毁

誉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》羊洳切，去御，以。］
［《廣韻》以諸切，平魚，以。］
“誉1”的繁体字。“輿2”的被通假字。
(1)称赞；赞美。
(2)名誉；声誉。
(3)通“豫”。欢愉；安乐。
(4)通“豫”。犹疑。参见“譽譽”。
(5)通“與”。党与；同类。
(6)通“與”。犹接触，晤对。
(7)姓。晋有誉粹。

誉字的英文翻译

◎ 誉
praise, reputation

誉字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譽； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1161第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?羊茹切，余去聲。【說文】稱也。【玉篇】聲美也。【易·坤卦】括囊无咎无譽。【註】譽者，過美之名。【詩·周頌】以永終譽。【箋】聲美也。【禮·表記】君子不以口譽人，則民作忠。【莊子·盜跖篇】好面譽人者，亦好背而毀之。　又【禮·祭統孔疏】援神契云：大夫之孝曰譽。　又星名。【晉書·天文志】瑞星，三曰含譽。　又姓。平原大守譽粹。見【晉書】。　又【諡法】狀古述今曰譽。　又通作豫。【詩·小雅】是以有譽處兮。【傳】譽，善聲也。處，安樂也。蘇氏曰：譽、豫通。凡詩之譽，皆言樂也。　又【韻會小補】通作與。【禮·射義】詩曰：則燕則譽。【鄭註】譽，或爲與。　又【廣韻】以諸切【集韻】【韻會】羊諸切，?音余。義同。【論語】誰毀誰譽。【朱傳】譽者，揚人之善，而過其實。譽平聲。又【詩·大雅】慶旣令居，韓姞燕譽。【傳】燕，安。譽，樂也。

誉字的源字形

誉字的起名意思

：指称赞，赞美，荣誉；特指好的名声，名望。

reputation
Basic explanation of words
reputation
(reputation)
yù
Reputation: Honor. reputation. Credibility. Get fame and fish for fame.
Praise, praise: Disapproval. Cross-mouth praise.
Gu Tong "Yu", joy.
destroy
reputation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" sheep cut, go to imperial, take. ]
["Guangyun" is based on all cuts, flat fish, with. ]
The traditional characters of "誉1". "Yu 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Praise; praise.
(2) Reputation; reputation.
(3) Through "Yu". Joy; happiness.
(4) Through "Yu". Hesitate. See "Yuyu".
(5) Through "and". Party and; the same kind.
(6) Through "and". Still touching, meeting right.
(7) Last name. Jin has a reputation.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Yu; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: Page 1161 and 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Sheep Ru cut, I went to sound. [Said Wen] Said also. [Jade articles] Sound and beauty. [Easy·Kun Gua] It has no blame and no reputation. [Note] Those who are honoured have the name of being beautiful. 【Poetry·Zhou Song】In order to endure forever. [J] Shengmei also. 【Ritual·Table Record】A gentleman does not praise others by his mouth, and the people shall be loyal. 【Zhuangzi·Pirates the Plant】A person who has a good face and a reputation can also be ruined by the back.　[Ritual·Memorial Confucian Confucianism] Helping God Qiyun: The doctor's filial piety is the reputation.　Also star name. 【Book of Jin·Astronomy】Rising, the third name means fame.　Another last name. Pingyuan dashou's reputation. See [Book of Jin].　 Also 【Posthumous Law】Presenting the ancients and presenting the present is called fame.　Tong Zuo Yu again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Being well-known. [Biography] Reputation, good voice. Place, peace and happiness. Su said: Yu, Yutong. The reputation of all poems is full of joy.　[Rhyme will be a small supplement] through the same. 【Rite·Shooting Righteousness】The poem says: If you swallow, you will be honored. [Zheng's Note] Honor, or for and.　 [Guang Yun] Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sheep Zhu Qi,? Yin Yu. The same meaning. [The Analects] Who destroys the reputation. [Zhu Chuan] The honourable person, promotes the good of others, and is exaggerated. Yu Pingsheng. Also 【Poetry·Daya】Qingchang Lingju, Han Yuyan Yu. [Biography] Yan, Ann. Fame, music also.
reputation

reputation
Name meaning
: Refers to praise, praise, honor; especially good reputation, fame.
誉
会意字。从言,表示用语言称赞;从與(与),與(与)有给予义,表示称誉是给予他人的;與(yi)兼表声。简体字从言、
从兴,表示称赞的言语使人高兴。本义是称赞。
①称赞:称~「过~「毀~参半。2名声(多指好的):
名~「荣~「驰~。
浮~ 毁~ 美~ 声~ 盛~ 时~ 信~ 虚~
载~ 赞~ 名~扫地 沽名钓~ 交口称~
yù
譽
譽
誉。
的T
репутация
Зная слово.
Congyan означает хвалу на словах; Conghe (和) и (和) обладают праведностью, что означает, что хвала дается другим; и (yi) также выражает здравый смысл.
Слова Congyan и Congxing упрощенными китайскими иероглифами делают людей счастливыми.
Первоначальное значение - похвала.
①Похвала: скажите ~ "Крест ~" Уничтожьте ~ Половину. 2 Репутация (несколько означает хорошее): Слава ~ "Ронг ~" Чи ~.
Плавающий ~ разрушенный ~ красивый ~ звук ~ процветающий ~ время ~ буква ~ воображаемый ~
Неси ~ хвала ~ имя ~ подмести землю и купи имя, чтобы ловить рыбу ~ через рот ~
репутация
репутация
репутация.
Т
yù
1) хвалить, восхвалять; захваливать, превозносить
谁毁谁誉 кого незаслуженно поносить, кого захваливать
2) добрая слава; хорошая репутация; популярность, известность
誉满全国 добрая слава о нём разнеслась по всей стране
3) вм. 豫 (веселье; радость; радоваться)
燕誉 пировать и веселиться
天下誉 вся Поднебесная радуется
4) вм. 豫 (сомнение)
5) вм. 与 (сообщник; единомышленник)
6) вм. 与 (общаться; вступать в контакт)
7) Юй (фамилия)
Radicals: 一, ハ, 言  (ground, fins, say, grass)
Meaning Mnemonic
There’s grass on the ground and the fins there say you have no honor. The fins are left over from the fish you dismembered and they do not believe it was an act of honor. Now they are just sitting on the ground on the grass, calling you out for having no honor.
Listen to what the fins have to say as they flop around on the ground in the grass. Hear them swish about as they flop, brushing up against the blades of grass.
Reading Mnemonic
Being one of little honor, you decide to squash these vocal fins with your yo-yo (よ). You take out your yo-yo and start bashing each fin with it until they stop talking about what little honor you have.
Imagine taking your yo-yo out to do this. Feel the string tighten around your finger as you unleash the yo-yo and silence all the fins.
